mdRecord.dcterms:title: University of Michigan: its origin, growth and principles of government / comp. by Lucius L. Hubbard
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hubbard, Lucius L. (Lucius Lee), 1849-1933
University of Michigan.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This copy has been corrected to include all changes through the Regents' Meeting of June, 1931.
Cover title: Constitutional and legislative acts, legal decisions and by-laws of the University of Michigan.

"Organization and aims of the University of Michigan as reflected in its by-laws restated in part from the laws and by-laws of July 18, 1883 and rom the record of the Regents' proceedings" has special t.-p. and paging.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Michigan.
Educational law and legislation--Michigan.
